message: Let's split it 60/40. It's a good deal for both of us in the first round.
I think a 60/40 split in my favor is fair, considering the inflation rates.
I understand the inflation affects me more, but your previous offer was too low. Let's meet in the middle - this split considers the time pressure and is still fair.
